did.unittitle: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers, 1940-1950
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Facsimile documents gathered by Professor James Gross and Cletus Daniels for their research project on black workers.

scopecontent.p: Contains employment situation surveys; migration survays; labor market development reports; labor market situation surveys; selective service system reports; field operating reports; labor demand-supply summaries; labor market surveys and other miscellaneous documentation regarding black workers for the period 1941-1948

controlaccess.corpname: United States. National Archives and Records Service.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers #5584 A. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
